name: 3impdirp1
params: wff w0, wff w1, wff w2, wff w3

stmt.origin: sylbir(wa(wa(w0, w2), wa(w1, w2)), w3, wa(wa(w1, w2), wa(w0, w2)))

body.origin:
|- wi(wa(wa(w0, w2), wa(w1, w2)), w3)
-| wb(wa(wa(w1, w2), wa(w0, w2)), wa(wa(w0, w2), wa(w1, w2)))
-| wi(wa(wa(w1, w2), wa(w0, w2)), w3)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w3a(w0, w1, w2), w3)
-| wb(wa(wa(w1, w2), wa(w0, w2)), wa(wa(w0, w2), wa(w1, w2)))
-| wi(wa(wa(w1, w2), wa(w0, w2)), w3)

body.origin: |- wb(wa(wa(w1, w2), wa(w0, w2)), wa(wa(w0, w2), wa(w1, w2)))

comment: A deduction unionizing a non-unionized collection of virtual hypotheses. Commuted version of ~ 3impdir . (Contributed by Alan Sare, 4-Feb-2017.) (Proof modification is discouraged.) (New usage is discouraged.)
